datalake_location.description: S3 URL passed to the Lambda as DATALAKE_LOCATION.

dynamodb_lock_table_name.description: DynamoDB lock table name used by delta-rs.

alarm_sns_topic_arn.description: Optional SNS topic ARN to notify alarms. If null, alarms are created without actions.

create_datalake_bucket.description: Whether Terraform should create the S3 bucket. If false, bucket must already exist.

datalake_bucket_name.description: S3 bucket name that stores the Delta Lake table.

datalake_prefix.description: S3 prefix (folder) under the bucket where the Delta Lake table lives (no leading slash).

enable_eventbridge_dlq.description: Whether to create an SQS DLQ for failed EventBridge->Lambda invocations.

lambda_memory_size.description: Lambda memory size in MB. Delta/Parquet workloads often need > 1024MB.

lambda_reserved_concurrency.description: Reserved concurrency for the Lambda. Set to 1 to avoid concurrent runs. Use -1 for unreserved.

lambda_zip_path.description: Path to the Lambda deployment ZIP produced by cargo-lambda (bootstrap.zip).

optimize_ds.description: Value for OPTIMIZE_DS env var. Use 'yesterday' to optimize yesterday's ds partition.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming.

s3_force_destroy.description: If creating the bucket, whether to allow force_destroy.
